main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Loogootee, Indiana on October 8, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared round and solid, silver or white in color., It was reported to be traveling at a speed of over 1000 mph., The object made no sound during the sighting., The observer described the flight as unaltering straight and level., A reliable Depot employee made the observation and there was no known air traffic at the time.
sighted object: one round and solid unidentified flying object
witness description: U.S. Navy personnel, reliable Depot employee
